articles.description: Follow live commentary & text updates as West Ham host Man Utd, plus five other fixtures including Liverpool v Arsenal in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: West Ham v Man Utd plus five other fixtures - Kambwala makes debut

articles.description: Follow radio commentary and live text from a heavyweight double-header as Anthony Joshua faces Otto Wallin and Deontay Wilder challenges Joseph Parker in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Britain's Dubois v Miller before Bivol v Arthur & Joshua v Wallin - radio & text

articles.description: Arsenal maintain their place at the top of the Premier League after a thrilling draw with Liverpool at Anfield.
articles.title: Arsenal stay top after thrilling Liverpool draw

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur move into the Premier League top four after two early strikes are enough to beat Everton, with Richarlison scoring against his former club.
articles.title: Richarlison scores again as Spurs move into top four

articles.description: Anthony Joshua boasts a 13lb weight advantage over Otto Wallin for Saturday's must-win heavyweight fight.
articles.title: 'Happy' Joshua weighs in 13lb heavier than Wallin

articles.description: West Ham score twice in six minutes to condemn Manchester United to an eighth Premier League defeat of the season at the London Stadium.
articles.title: Bowen on target as West Ham beat flat Man Utd

articles.description: Luton live up to their pledge of making it "a special day" for convalescing captain Tom Lockyer with an emotionally charged win over Newcastle.
articles.title: Hatters honour Lockyer in win against Newcastle

articles.description: Rebecca Welch becomes the first woman to referee a Premier League match on Saturday as she takes charge of Fulham's fixture with Burnley.
articles.title: Welch becomes first woman to referee in Premier League

articles.description: Steve Nielsen resigns from his role as sporting director of Formula 1's governing body the FIA less than a year since being appointed.
articles.title: FIA sporting director Nielsen quits after less than a year

articles.description: Kyogo Furuhashi and Liam Scales are on target as Celtic recover from successive Premiership losses to see off stubborn Livingston.
articles.title: Celtic sink Livingston with second-half double
